text: Bernard Hofstede (born 22 September 1980) is a Dutch footballer who plays as a midfielder for De Treffers. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch footballers Category:VVV-Venlo players Category:Heracles Almelo players Category:FC Volendam players Category:Fortuna Sittard players Category:Eerste Divisie players Category:People from Tegelen Category:De Treffers players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Bernard Hofstede
